text: Obama has said that Cecile Richards dedicated her life to protecting and expanding women’s rights. She never wavered in her commitment to ensuring that women had access to the reproductive health care they needed, and her leadership at Planned Parenthood led to the inclusion of important healthcare…
Cecile Richards devoted her life to defending women’s freedoms and access to reproductive care. Her work with Planned Parenthood was transformational. - barackobama
Cecile Richards never wavered in her commitment to reproductive health access for women in this country.
Cecile Richards dedicated her life to protecting and expanding women’s rights.
Cecile Richards… led Planned Parenthood with a passion for service. Her unwavering commitment ensured that women had reproductive care when they needed it most.
Cecile Richards dedicated her life to protecting and expanding womens rights. She never waivered in her commitment to ensuring women had access to the reproductive healthcare they needed.
Cecile Richards’ leadership at Planned Parenthood led to the inclusion of important healthcare in the broader reproductive conversation.
Cecile Richards never wavered in her commitment to ensuring that women had access to the reproductive health care they needed.
Cecile Richards was dedicated to the expansion of women's health. As head of Planned Parenthood, she pushed for critical care inclusion.
Cecile Richards ensured women had access to reproductive health care. Her dedication never faded, and her work with Planned Parenthood changed lives.
